survey_name: Patient Satisfaction with Telehealth Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from patients about their experiences with telehealth services, including ease of use, satisfaction with care, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of care received through telehealth services?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better measurement of satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is clear and mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of care received through telehealth services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following telehealth features have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Ensure the options cover common telehealth features.

script.question_text: Which of the following telehealth features have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, did you encounter while using telehealth services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, did you encounter while using telehealth services?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use telehealth services again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure likelihood. Ensure the question is clear and mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use telehealth services again in the future?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your telehealth experience?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to capture detailed suggestions. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your telehealth experience?
